name: FORCE MCP STDIO Iterative Implementation Loop
description: Agentic iterative loop for autonomous implementation of annotated roadmap items, maintaining full referential integrity between codebase, Linear, and FORCE learnings.

phases.name: Enumerate Incomplete Roadmap Items
steps: Parse annotated implementation report for all items marked incomplete or in-progress.
Map each item to its Linear issue and technical requirements.

phases.name: Implement Item
steps: Implement required code and database changes using Supabase tools only.
Perform git workflow (#force-mcp-stdio pattern): commit code, capture commit hash.
Update corresponding Linear issue status, adding a detailed comment with commit hash and summary of changes.
Document changes in FORCE learnings and annotated report as needed.

phases.name: Iterate Until Complete
steps: Repeat for all remaining items, minimizing user interaction and maintaining full referential integrity.
Validate completion and update governance records.

constraints: Use Supabase tools only for all DB operations.
All Linear status changes must include detailed comments and git commit hashes.
Strict adherence to annotated implementation plan.
Minimize user interaction; agent should work autonomously.
outputs: Updated Linear issues with comments and status
Updated FORCE learnings and annotated report
